pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: がっちり組んで助け合わねばならない。
lessons.indonesian: You and I must stick close, back to back.

lessons.japanese: 彼は背が高く骨組みのがっちりした人だ。
lessons.indonesian: He is a tall and strongly built man.
